Q_NAME: Sum of Integers using Array of Objects
Q_DESC:
Create a class called integer representing a member x. Also, define the following member functions in the class:

get(): to read the value of x
display(): to display the value of x
sum(): to determine the sum of values of all x available in several objects

Note: 

Use default constructor to initialize x to 0.
Create an array of 10 objects for the class integer. 
The member function sum must take an object as parameter.

Input:
The no. of objects must be less than or equal to 10.
The first line of the input must contain the no. of objects.
The subsequent lines of input must contain the value of x for each object.

Output:
The output must print the sum of x values of all objects.
